mapper.insert:
SELECT REPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO REPLY (reply_no, member_no, com_no, reply_content, reply_created_at) VALUES (#{replyNo}, #{memberNo}, #{comNo}, #{content}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT r.reply_no as reply_no, r.com_no as com_no, r.reply_content as reply_content, r.reply_created_at as reply_created_at, m.member_num as member_no, m.member_name as member_name FROM reply r INNER JOIN member m ON r.member_no = m.member_num WHERE r.com_no=#{comNo} ORDER BY reply_created_at ASC
